item.title: index
item.description: Gempaign How to Explore Folders are simply used to declutter the space. Prefer navigating by tags by prefixing your search with # or by going to tags.

item.title: Shardlands
item.description: Shardlands The lands dotted with scars from the Commonization wars and left unclaimed as civilization concentrated from Industrialization & Regulation.

item.title: Labradorite
item.description: Labradorite Intrinsic Power: morphing of matter Crystallization:.

item.title: Sapphire
item.description: Sapphire Sapphire’s Intrinsic Power grants its users accelerated thought processing allowing them to conclude the best possible scenario despite hundreds of variables.

item.title: Tricolor Academy
item.description: Tricolor Academy A prestigious academic institution in the Trinity Kingdom purpose-built to create more Arbiters, Shardwalkers, Inscriptionists, and Runeographers.

item.title: Industrialization & Regulation
item.description: Industrialization & Regulation The wars from the times of Commonization began to die down as the consolidation of power worsened and the remaining participants could no longer sustain the constant, escalating conflict.

item.title: Ruby
item.description: Ruby The Intrinsic Power of rubies grants enhanced reflexes allowing its users to move far before they register a threat.

item.title: Prismatic Guard
item.description: Prismatic Guard A joint coalition of Arbiters and Shardwalkers developed and deployed by the Trinity Kingdom.

item.title: Trinity Kingdom
item.description: Trinity Kingdom A still-standing nation established before Commonization only grown more powerful from the investments of gem families.

item.title: Resilience
item.description: Resilience A measure of matter’s intrinsic resistance to Strain. Dependent on gem-type. Inorganic matter generally has a higher resilience.
